gov.usgs.earthquake.nshmp.geo.json

Class Feature

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.usgs.earthquake.nshmp.geo.json.Feature

  • public class Feature
extends Object
    A GeoJSON feature.

    This class provides factory methods to create single-use GeoJSON feature builders for different geometries.

    See GeoJson for examples.

    Author:
    Peter Powers, Brandon Clayton

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Feature.Builder
      A single-use feature builder.

      • idAsString

        public String idAsString()
        The 'id' of this feature as a string.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if this feature does not contain an 'id' member. Use hasId() to test whether 'id' member exists.

      • idAsInt

        public int idAsInt()
        The 'id' of this feature as an integer.
        Throws:

        The bounding box value array; may be null.

        Get the property map associated with this feature as a Properties helper object. May be null or empty.

      • type

        public GeoJson.Type type()
        The GeoJSON geometry type of this feature, one of: [POINT, LINE_STRING, POLYGON].
        See Also:
        GeoJson.Type

      • asPoint

        public Location asPoint()
        Return the geometry of this feature as a point.
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - if feature is not a point.
